title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Bonus GTA$ in New Dispatch Work
content:
The LSPD’s corruption has Vincent sick to his stomach, and those who own the new Vapid Dominator FX Interceptor and Declasse Impaler LX Cruiser — or any Law Enforcement Vehicle – can help with the cure in Dispatch Work.

Finishing one Dispatch Work Job will land you a GTA$100,000 bonus, while completing three anytime this week will reward you with an additional GTA$100,000.
